test.description: Simple change of control validity based on MIP
test.name: oxf:pipeline

mip.name: calculate
mip.expression: string((if (string(../units) castable as xs:integer and string(../price) castable as xs:decimal) then ../units * ../price else '-')[1])

analysis.expression: string((if (string(../units) castable as xs:integer and string(../price) castable as xs:decimal) then ../units * ../price else '-')[1])

mip.name: relevant
mip.expression: boolean(for $u in ../units return string($u) castable as xs:decimal and $u > 0)

analysis.expression: boolean(for $u in ../units return string($u) castable as xs:decimal and $u > 0)

mip.name: calculate
mip.expression: string((sum(for $t in ../../items/item/total[string(.) castable as xs:decimal] return $t))[1])

analysis.expression: string((sum(for $t in ../../items/item/total[string(.) castable as xs:decimal] return $t))[1])

mip.name: calculate
mip.expression: string((for $t in ../subtotal + ../tax return if ($t > 4000) then $t else $t * 0.9)[1])

analysis.expression: string((for $t in ../subtotal + ../tax return if ($t > 4000) then $t else $t * 0.9)[1])

test.description: PO example: change to values causing change to MIPs

analysis.expression: string((xxf:format-message( 'NOTE: {0,number,integer} out of {1,number,integer} {1,choice,1#document|1<documents} {0,choice,1#is|1<are} invalid. Only valid documents will be imported.', for $n in (invalid, processed) return xs:integer($n) ))[1])

xf:var.name: map
xf:var.value: map:merge( ( map:entry('number', number/xs:integer(.)), map:entry('string', string/string()), map:entry('node', node), map:entry('sequence', 1 to 10) ) )
